item.title: Selecting My Blogging Platform
item.author: interruptrequestio@gmail.com (Wes Carroll)
item.description: Now that I have selected my name, I had to select a platform to publish on. I looked at several options including WordPress, Ghost, Blogger, and a few others. WordPress was the front runner for a while, but what I really wanted was a simplistic method to host static pages, version control, create and edit content anywhere, support for a custom domain name, and as free as possible.
